Rule: Being Married (Self-Employed or Private) leads to higher income, even with the same education level (HS-grad).
Higher education levels (Masters, Doctorate) lead to higher income, regardless of marital status and gender.
Being Male leads to higher income, even with the same education level (Masters) and marital status (Widowed).
Working more hours (e.g., 56 hours per week) can lead to higher income, regardless of education level and marital status.
